name: Spirit Naga
description: A serpentine creature with a humanoid head, the Spirit Naga is known for its mastery of necromancy and dark magic, often serving as rulers of ancient ruins or hidden temples.
memorable: Possesses the ability to rejuvenate, returning to life if killed; commands legions of undead.
goals: Crave power and control; rule ancient ruins or hidden places with dark magic.
relations: Related to other Nagas and often encountered with undead minions.
environment: Typically found in ancient ruins or hidden temples.
strengths: Skilled spellcaster capable of powerful enchantments and commands necrotic damage through weapon attacks.
weaknesses: Dependent on spell components; can be vulnerable if outmaneuvered or if its spells are disrupted.
attacks: Melee attack with bite causing piercing and poison damage, and can spit poison for ranged damage.
most_powerful_ability: Rejuvenation allows it to come back to life after being slayed, making it a persistent threat.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, enabling exceptional ability to hide.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and charmed condition.
Casts powerful spells like Lightning Bolt and Blight.
Can teleport and hide as a bonus action.
Magical attacks deal additional necrotic damage.
Has advantages in Dexterity and Constitution saving throws.
spellcasting: 9th-level spellcaster with a variety of spells including dominate person, hypnotic pattern, and lightning bolt.
